credits: Tubbo_ & The TubNet Team (some assets), Callum_Is_Bad, The TubNet Community, The Crystalized Open Source Team.
notes: alot of this shit is totally pointleses, but I made most of the strings here for fun
crystalized.placeholder.big: Placeholder Text. If you're a player and you're reading this, please report this to our Discord as a bug. If you're a Developer and you're seeing this, this can be used to visualize long text, kinda like lorem ipsum.
crystalized.ls.name: LiteStrike
crystalized.ls.desc: In this 4v4 gamemode, You must either place the S.H.A.R.D device and defend it before it explodes or Destory it before it explodes.
crystalized.ls.credits: Heavily Inspired by Lightstrike from TubNet. (re)Created by: The Crystalized Open Source Team.
crystalized.ls.team.breaker.objective: Destory the S.H.A.R.D device in the required time or kill all the Placers!
crystalized.ls.team.placers.objective: Place the S.H.A.R.D device in the required time or kill all the Breakers!
crystalized.ls.hasplanted2.breaker: has planted the star. Defend it from the Breaker!
crystalized.ls.hasplanted2.placers: has planted the star. Destroy it before it explodes!
crystalized.ls.eventplaceholder: [!] An special event is happening, Check your surroundings.
crystalized.item.shard.name: S.H.A.R.D
crystalized.item.shard.desc: A heavy device, You have to plant this in the required time and defend it before this explodes. Hold right click to place.
crystalized.item.slimesword.name: Slime Sword
crystalized.item.slimesword.desc: Pushes players with great knockback and slows them down.
crystalized.item.pufferfishsword.name: Pufferfish Sword
crystalized.item.multicrossbow.name: Multi Crossbow
crystalized.item.quickchargecrossbow.des: This Crossbow charges quicker than normal.
crystalized.item.chargedcrossbow.name: Charged Crossbow
crystalized.item.chargedcrossbow.desc: Replaces arrows with a lazer beam attack that hits players instantly! Amplified with Explosive & Dragon arrows.
crystalized.item.marksmanbow.name: Marksman Bow
crystalized.item.explosivebow.name: Explosive Bow
crystalized.item.explosivebow.desc: Arrows explode on impact. Explosive Arrows will do extra damage. Amplified with Explosive Arrows.
crystalized.item.ricochetbow.name: Ricochet Map
crystalized.item.ricochetbow.desc: Arrows bounce multiple times before impact.
crystalized.item.dragonarrow.name: Dragon Arrow
crystalized.item.dragonarrow.desc: On impact, will create dragon's breath around the arrow that will damage players when they walk on it.
crystalized.item.explosivearrow.name: Explosive Arrow
crystalized.item.explosivearrow.desc: Will explode on impact, Amplified with Explosive Bow.
crystalized.item.orb.boost.name: Boost Orb
crystalized.item.orb.boost.desc: Gives you a speed boost in whatever direction you're looking towards, can also left you up in the air.
crystalized.item.orb.bridge.name: Bridge Orb
crystalized.item.orb.bridge.desc: Makes a bridge in whatever direction you throw this at.
crystalized.item.orb.explosive.name: Explosive Orb
crystalized.item.orb.grappling.name: Grapple Orb
crystalized.item.orb.grappling.desc: Will Push you towards whatever you aim at. Can also be used to drag players towards you.
crystalized.item.orb.healing.name: Healing Orb
crystalized.item.orb.knockout.name: Knockout Orb
crystalized.item.orb.knockout.desc: Launch a auto-targetting missile to the nearist player.
crystalized.item.orb.poison.name: Poison Orb
crystalized.item.orb.winged.name: Winged Orb
crystalized.item.orb.winged.desc: Launches you to the sky! (Will give you an elytra which will replace your chestplace if applicable)
